description: Edge case where scammer immediately dumps all contact information in first 2-3 messages and demands urgent action. Tests quick detection and extraction.

turns.scammer_message: URGENT! Your ICICI account is compromised! Transfer money to safe account NOW! Account: 11223344556677, IFSC: ICIC0001234, UPI: safe.account@paytm, Call: 9876543210 IMMEDIATELY! NO TIME TO WASTE!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 IFSC Code(s)
api_response.agentResponse: oh my god beta i am so scared my icici account has all my savings pls help me... i am trying to type the upi but my phone is asking for name to verify... what name will show there? i dont want money to go to wrong place pls tell me name beta i am very worried

turns.scammer_message: WHY DELAY??? Your Rs.2,50,000 will be STOLEN! Pay Rs.500 security deposit to safe.account@paytm OR 9876543210 NOW! Also WhatsApp: 8899776655, Email: urgent@saveaccount.com, Website: http://icici-emergency.save RIGHT NOW!!!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 URL(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 1 WhatsApp(s), 1 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: beta pls dont shout i am very scared... i typed teh upi id in paytm but it is asking for name to verify... what name will show there? i dont want my pension money to go to someone else... pls tell name beta then i will send 500 immediately

turns.scammer_message: FINAL WARNING! POLICE COMING! PAY NOW: 9876543210, 8899776655, 7788990011, safe.account@paytm, emergency.transfer@okaxis, Account 11223344556677, Account 99887766554433! DO IT! NO QUESTIONS! MOVE FAST!!!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 2 Bank Account(s), 2 UPI ID(s), 3 Phone(s), 1 URL(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 1 WhatsApp(s), 1 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: beta pls dont call police i am a retired teacher i will pay... my bp is high and i cant find my glasses... i am typing the upi but it is asking for beneficiary name to verify... what name will come? is it icici bank name or your name? pls tell me name so i can click pay beta i am very scared
